foreignData.name: Furchtlose Einigkeit
foreignData.text:
Bonus {1}{W} (Du kannst zusätzlich {1}{W} bezahlen, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst.)
Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Falls die Bonuskosten dieses Zauberspruchs bezahlt wurden, erhalten die Kreaturen stattdessen +2/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Solidaridad audaz
foreignData.text:
Estímulo {1}{W}. (Puedes pagar {1}{W} adicionales al lanzar este hechizo.)
Las criaturas que controlas obtienen +1/+1 hasta el final del turno. Si este hechizo fue estimulado, en vez de eso, esas criaturas obtienen +2/+1 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Unité intrépide
foreignData.text:
Kick {1}{W} (Vous pouvez payer {1}{W} supplémentaires au moment où vous lancez ce sort.)
Les créatures que vous contrôlez gagnent +1/+1 jusqu'à la fin du tour. Si ce sort a été kické, ces créatures gagnent +2/+1 jusqu'à la fin du tour à la place.

foreignData.name: Unità Intrepida
foreignData.text:
Potenziamento {1}{W} (Puoi pagare {1}{W} addizionale mentre lanci questa magia.)
Le creature che controlli prendono +1/+1 fino alla fine del turno. Se questa magia è stata potenziata, quelle creature prendono invece +2/+1 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: 不屈の団結
foreignData.text:
キッカー{1}{W}（あなたはこの呪文を唱えるに際し、追加で{1}{W}を支払ってもよい。）
ターン終了時まで、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーは＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。この呪文がキッカーされていたなら、代わりに、ターン終了時まで、それらのクリーチャーは＋２/＋１の修整を受ける。

foreignData.name: 불굴의 통합
foreignData.text:
키커 {1}{W} (이 주문을 발동하면서 추가 {1}{W}를 지불할 수 있다.)
당신이 조종하는 생물들은 턴종료까지 +1/+1을 받는다. 이 주문의 키커 비용이 지불되었다면, 그 생물들은 대신 턴종료까지 +2/+1을 받는다.

foreignData.name: Unidade Inabalável
foreignData.text:
Reforçar {1}{W} (Você pode pagar um custo adicional de {1}{W} ao conjurar esta mágica.)
As criaturas que você controla recebem +1/+1 até o final do turno. Se esta mágica foi reforçada, em vez disso, aquelas criaturas recebem +2/+1 até o final do turno.

foreignData.name: Непоколебимое Единство
foreignData.text:
Усилитель {1}{W} (При разыгрывании этого заклинания вы можете дополнительно заплатить {1}{W}.)
Существа под вашим контролем получают +1/+1 до конца хода. Если это заклинание получило Усилитель, те существа вместо этого получают +2/+1 до конца хода.

foreignData.name: 不屈齐心
foreignData.text:
增幅{1}{W}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{W}。）
由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。如果此咒语已增幅，则改为这些生物得+2/+1直到回合结束。

foreignData.name: 不屈齊心
foreignData.text:
增幅{1}{W}（你施放此咒語時可以額外支付{1}{W}。）
由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合結束。如果此咒語已增幅，則改為這些生物得+2/+1直到回合結束。

name: Dauntless Unity
originalText:
Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get +2/+1 until end of turn instead.

rulings.text: Kicker represents an optional additional cost that you may choose to pay as you cast the spell. A spell cast with that additional cost paid is “kicked.”
You can’t pay a kicker cost more than once.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can’t kick it.

If you copy a kicked spell, the copy is also kicked. If a card or token enters the battlefield as a copy of a permanent that’s already on the battlefield, the new permanent isn’t kicked, even if the original was.

To determine a spell’s total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card’s effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.

Some instant or sorcery spells require alternative or additional targets if they’re kicked. You ignore these targeting requirements if those spells aren’t kicked, and you can’t kick those spells unless you can choose the appropriate targets. On the other hand, you can kick a permanent spell even if you won’t be able to choose targets for an enters-the-battlefield ability of that permanent once the spell resolves.

An ability that triggers when a player casts a kicked spell resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger, but after targets have been chosen for that spell. It resolves even if that spell is countered.
